name: C.H.A.O.S. (Digx7)
description:
Critical Human Analysis Observation System [C.H.A.O.S.] can you a mere human fly your ship THROUGH SPACE and collect all the gems.  The controls weren't made for you but maybe you can make it work.

===========================================================

This game was made for the Mini Jam 74 game jam.  The theme was Chaos and the limitation was the fact that you could only use the following keys: A X SPACE B P 8.  No other buttons or input methods could be used.

===========================================================

Controls

Rotate_____A/X

Move______Space

Shoot______B

Grab_______P

Break______8

===========================================================

Credits

Music: Daft Punk - Around the world (Official Audio)  link
